channel.title: Duel Arena, Delta
channel.description:
Hey, I tried to code a Duel Arena, everything worked fine, I fixed the errors I had, but... When I'm teleported in the arena, I cannot Attack anyone else. I modifyed the place to the wilderness, to a Multi Pk Zone, I tried everything out, but it didn't work. The 'Attack' button does not appear.
Also in the Duel Interface, I cannot stake Items, when I click on an item, I wear it.
Could anyone help me with this? :)

item.title: Duel Arena, Delta
item.dc:creator: @santa_hatz santa hatz
item.description:
@santa_hatz wrote:

Try deleting your full duel arena codes, and getting some new ones, their is a big long code missing out of this, and not just one there is a few.

Read full topic

item.title: Duel Arena, Delta
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Hey, I tried to code a Duel Arena, everything worked fine, I fixed the errors I had, but…
When I’m teleported in the arena, I cannot Attack anyone else.
I modifyed the place to the wilderness, to a Multi Pk Zone, I tried everything out, but it didn’t work.

Could anyone help me with this?
